body: Good call, we should extract the fix from there, I'll do it!

issue.title: Reactive DB2 Client - Use vetted pattern to access runtime config in recorder
Run time configuration should not be consumed in Build Steps

repository.name: quarkus-logging-json
repository.description: Quarkus logging extension outputting the logging in json.

issue.body:
Run time configuration should not be consumed in Build Steps. Reproduced with newer Quarkus releases, 3.25+ .


2025-08-14T09:42:32Z WARN  [io.quarkus.deployment] (main) Run time configuration should not be consumed in Build Steps, use RuntimeValue<io.quarkiverse.loggingjson.config.Config> in a @Recorder constructor instead at io.quarkiverse.loggingjson.config.Config config of io.quarkus.deployment.builditem.LogConsoleFormatBuildItem io.quarkiverse.loggingjson.deployment.LoggingJsonProcessor.setUpConsoleFormatter(io.quarkus.deployment.Capabilities,io.quarkiverse.loggingjson.LoggingJsonRecorder,io.quarkiverse.loggingjson.config.Config) of class io.quarkiverse.loggingjson.deployment.LoggingJsonProcessor


Similar with https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/49292 and please see the fix https://github.com/gsmet/quarkus/commit/03c5a3b41bfdaac1aa63adcbdace429d4190d20f
